short_term_goals: Refine and optimize the AI-driven platform based on user feedback and data analysis from the MVP stage.
Secure partnerships with a select group of lenders to validate the platform's impact on lending decisions and borrower outcomes.
Expand the user base through targeted marketing campaigns focusing on individuals with limited credit history.
Enhance brand awareness and credibility through participation in industry events and thought leadership initiatives.
Successfully complete the Google AI Startup Accelerator program and leverage the learnings to improve the platform and GTM strategy.
growth_strategy.long_term_vision: To become the leading platform for promoting financial inclusion and responsible lending in the UK and beyond, by leveraging AI and Open Banking to empower individuals with personalized financial support and enable lenders to make fairer and more informed decisions.
expansion_plans: Expand partnerships with a wider range of lenders, including banks, credit unions, and fintech companies.
Introduce new features and services to the platform, such as financial planning tools, credit monitoring, and debt management support.
Explore opportunities to expand into new markets, starting with other European countries with similar financial inclusion challenges.
Develop strategic partnerships with organizations that provide financial literacy education and mental health support.
Potentially explore B2C direct model in addition to B2B2C, offering services directly to consumers.
growth_strategy.scaling_approach: Good With's scaling approach will likely involve a phased strategy, starting with a focus on building a strong foundation in the UK market. This includes validating the platform's effectiveness, establishing key partnerships, and building a strong brand reputation. As the company grows, it will leverage its AI-driven platform to automate key processes and personalize the user experience. This will enable Good With to scale its operations efficiently while maintaining a high level of customer satisfaction. The company will also explore strategic partnerships to expand its reach and enter new markets. The focus on Open Banking and behavioral data creates a scalable model, as data accessibility increases and AI algorithms improve. Key to scaling will be maintaining data privacy and security compliance as they expand.
